sections.heading: Authority; perpetual succession; bylaws
sections.text: The authority shall have perpetual succession as a body politic and corporate and may adopt bylaws for the regulation of its affairs and the conduct of its business.SourceLaws 1981, LB 321, ยง 19;R.S.1943, (1994), ยง 79-2919;Laws 1995, LB 5, ยง 19;R.S.1943, (2008
